meanings.definition: Covered with or having many leaves
meanings.sent1: The tree in our backyard is very leafy.
meanings.sent2: The forest looked so green and leafy in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: I felt like a leafy superhero with all these trees around me.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a leafy maze, full of twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The salad was bursting with fresh, leafy greens.

meanings.definition: Resembling a leaf in shape or appearance
meanings.sent1: The leafy pattern on the fabric was beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The butterfly had delicate, leafy wings.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated with tiny, leafy designs.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was styled in a leafy, intricate braid.
meanings.sent5: The painting depicted a leafy landscape with vibrant colors.

meanings.sent1: The leafy veins of the plant were fascinating.
meanings.sent2: The botanist studied the leafy structures of different plants.
meanings.sent3: The leafy conversation at the garden party was all about plants.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was adorned with leafy motifs.
meanings.sent5: The leafy aroma of the forest filled the air.
